title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Designing Virtual World-Based Collaborative Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education theories and experience applying digital tools
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners design at least three language learning scenarios using virtual world platforms (Gather Town, Zepeto, etc.).
Learners achieve over 80% engagement through collaborative problem-solving activities.
Learners improve project-based educational content by incorporating peer evaluation and feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
